document.description: Search or browse our list of fast-food restaurant, chain companies in PA by ... 2500 E End Inc (Carriage Stop Plaza) ... Restaurant, Lunch Counter (20) Restaurants ...
document.body:
%3c%54%41%42%4c%45%20%69%64%3d"%73%62%62%5f%78%68%69"%20%73%74%79%6c%65%3d"%64%69%73%70%6c%61%79%3a%6e%6f%6e%65"%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%71%57%71%79%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%74%6d%57%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%74%63%4c%72%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%4b%46%66%6f%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%4c%79%58%79%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%58%4f%78%57%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%52%48%4a%65%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%46%63%77%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%2f%54%52%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%61%48%71%62%68%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%46%6f%63%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%4c%4c%65%43%67%65%52%66%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%6c%5a%79%52%43%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%69%61%57%4b%4d%72%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%57%6a%55%6e%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%44%6e%72%62%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%49%5a%44%43%57%63%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%2f%54%52%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%6d%43%6f%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%4b%63%63%48%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%50%42%56%43%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%74%53%6e%44%45%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%67%4f%68%4f%4b%6e%67%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%76%6f%65%51%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%50%4a%57%55%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%68%53%43%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%2f%54%52%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%
